title: Ticket #488: [RFE] $([])
description:
Context: log = $$([$(Process)+100]).log

There are some subtleties with $$(). It is only evaluated after the job is matched to a machine. That's too late for choosing the log file, but not too late for other things, such as the arguments (which is what I assumed you were trying to set).

$$() is evaluated after matching and $() is evaluated at submit time. We are only using $$() in this case because it happens to support evaluation of arbitrary expressions via $$([expr]) syntax. We don't need access to attributes of the machine in this expression, so it is too bad that something like $([expr]) isn't supported. That would do the trick nicely.

--Dan
